creditline: Lent by Michele and David Dewey
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: square mouth; four distinct sides to vase; pear-shaped body; foot is squared off at top and widens at bottom; lid is a square pyramid with four hook-like elements at each corner; four bronze circular handles with decorative elements above them; images of animals in gold on body and lid; black horizontal lines and curvilinear and linear designs in black throughout vase
title: Vase, one of a pair
